metadata.title: Vault by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vault secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets in modern computing. Vault handles leasing, key revocation, key rolling, auditing, and provides secrets as a service through a unified API.

packageManagers.label: Ubuntu/Debian
commands: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install vault

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Vault Integrations.

integrations.name: Couchbase Capella Database Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Generates database credentials dynamically based on configured roles for a Couchbase Capella database.

integrations.name: Keyfactor PKI Secrets Engine
integrations.description: The Keyfactor Secrets Engine provides a PKI backend for Vault to issue trusted certificates via the Keyfactor platform.

integrations.name: Venafi PKI Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Have certificate requests fulfilled by the Venafi Trust Protection Platform or Venafi as a Service.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: Vault Ethereum Secrets Engine
integrations.description: A plugin that turns Vault into an Ethereum wallet.

integrations.name: Vault Cognito Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Enables you to request credentials from AWS Cognito.

integrations.name: Userpass Auth Method
integrations.description: Allows users to authenticate with Vault using a username and password combination.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

integrations.name: Transit Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Cryptographic functions on data in-transit.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

integrations.name: Transform Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Secure data transformation and tokenization against provided input value.

flags.name: Built-in

flags.name: Enterprise
flags.description: This integration is only available for enterprise users.

integrations.name: TOTP Secrets Engine
integrations.description: Generate time-based credentials according to the TOTP standard.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

integrations.name: TLS Certificate Auth Method
integrations.description: Allows authentication using SSL/TLS client certificates which are either signed by a CA or self-signed.

flags.name: Built-in

integrations.name: Terraform Cloud / Enterprise Auth Method
integrations.description: Enables Terraform Cloud & Terraform Enterprise to authenticate with Vault.

integrations.description: Generate unique, ephemeral user API keys and STS AssumeRole credentials.

integrations.name: TencentCloud Auth Method
integrations.description: Authenticate to Vault using Cloud Access Management (CAM).
